channel.title: CVE Feed for WappPress Team -- WappPress

item.title: CVE-2024-38758|2024-07-26T16:02:11.850Z -- wapppress%20team -- wapppress
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in WappPress Team WappPress.This issue affects WappPress: from n/a through 6.0.4.

item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in WappPress Team WappPress.This issue affects WappPress: from n/a through 5.0.3.
